page.title: 15Tourist Accommodation
page.content: There are two hotels in the area: the Hagdale Lodge and the Baltasound Hotel. Hagdale Lodge has 48 bedrooms and the cost of accommodation is Â£15 a night. There are 4 contract workers staying on a long term basis and 9 staff. Hagdale was until 1979 a work camp for Plessy and Marconi who did work at the RAF radars at Saxavord it was then converted into a hotel. The second hotel is the Baltasound hotel which has 12 bedrooms ,and its prices range from Â£16.50 - Â£21.50 it has \ a dozen contract workers and 5 staff.The original name of the hotel was Springfield and is still locally called the "Springers".Of the few bed and breakfast places one lady offers 2 rooms with "good food like fish and home-baked bread." This lady also will teach tourists to spin and gives them the chance to cut peat if they want.
